extDescription.message: A persistent sidebar for Chrome, with tree-style tabs, branching tab histories, bookmarks bar, and more.

option_keepSidebarOnTop.message: Keep sidebar visible next to dock window

option_keepSidebarOnTop_hint.message:
If enabled, when switching to Chrome from another app, Sidewise will bring the sidebar to the front, so other windows don't obscure or hide it.

Note: unfortunately this messes with the OS's window-ordering; on Windows, you'll have to Alt-Tab twice to get back to your last non-Chrome window when this option is enabled.

option_browserActionButtonBehavior.message: When browser toolbar button is clicked

option_dockState.message: Dock sidebar to this side of the window

optionsSaveNotNeeded.message: Note: Settings are automatically saved as you change them.
